column4: i feel like an ass  i bought a radeon 4800 card for my ssytem (gaming/work PC) and now finding out ati support is not so good in ubuntu. i have another system that ia  pentium D 2GHZ with a cheap motherboard (intel 945G chipset) and 2 GB with a geforce 8600GT gfx card and wondeing if such a system is good to running java application server, apache http and postgresql at the same time?
your graphics card has nothing to do with java
